content: k to end needle 1 k to 8 stitches before end p1 k3 needle 2 k all stitches p1 k3 needle 2 k all stitches round 4 round 4 needle 1 k3 p1 1/2 rc p1 k to end needle 1 k to 8 stitches before end p1 1/2 needle 2 k all stitches lc p1 k3 needle 2 k all stitches heel when you ve reached the desired leg length knit in pattern across needle one and insert your heel of choice see a note on heels on needle 2 return to pattern for another 16 pattern repeats or until the desired length of foot less 2 or 5cm is reached toe instructions apply for both needles 1 and 2 rounds 1 - 4 6 - 7 9 knit all stitches rounds 5 8 10 k1 ssk knit to last 3 stitches k2tog k1 repeat round 10 until 10 12 14 16 stitches remain on each needle and break working yarn leaving 8 tail proceed to close the toe using kitchener stitch and refer to finishing notes below finishing weave in ends and steam or wet block gently without stretching the cable cross should open up in a lovely way when worn abbreviations k knit p purl 1/2 rc slip 2 sts onto cn hold in back k1 k2 from cn 1/2 lc slip 1 sts onto cn hold in front k2 k1 from cn k2tog knit two stitches together ssk slip slip knit version 1 0 © eric lutz 2021 february 2021
